com.ge.dspmicro.tcpsocketserver.api

Interface ITCPSocketService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITCPSocketHandler
    Deprecated. 
    Use java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel to manage socket connections.

    @Deprecated
public interface ITCPSocketService
extends ITCPSocketHandler
    This is the ITCPSocketHandler to be used when the server is in PROTOBUF mode.

    Interface used in 'white-board' pattern implemented by ITCPSocketServer instances. Applications that register as OSGi services under the ITCPSocketService interface will be tracked by ITCPSocketServer instances so that messages are delivered according to the serviceID requested by the client on the port that the ITCPSocketServer instance is bound to.

    ITCPSocketService implementations need only register as OSGi services and the ITCPSocketServer instance will bind to the ITCPSocketService implementation when requested by a socket client.

    As a reminder, there can be multiple instances of the ITCPSocketServer (one per open port). The interface is setup so that implementing classes can track multiple instance

    A ITCPSocketServer instance binds to a SocketService once the client has requested the service by serviceID. This means a client message will have been received prior to binding to the service. When a ITCPSocketServer binds to a ITCPSocketService implementation, a callback is delivered along with the client ID and server port so that clients and server instances can be tracked. A server port is also delivered when a client message is delivered to the ITCPSocketService implementation

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TCPSocketMessage clientCallResponse(int serverPort, TCPSocketMessage message)
      Deprecated. 
      Called by a ITCPSocketServer instance to deliver a client message.
      int getServiceID()
      Deprecated. 
      Called by a ITCPSocketServer instance to retrieve the serviceID of the implementing service.
      void setServerCallback(int serverPort, String extProgramName, IAsyncMessageCallback callback)
      Deprecated. 
      Called by a ITCPSocketServer instance to bind to the ITCPSocketService.
      void unsetServerCallback(IAsyncMessageCallback callback)
      Deprecated. 
      Called by a ITCPSocketServer instance to unbind from the ITCPSocketService.

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceID

        int getServiceID()
        Deprecated. 
        Called by a ITCPSocketServer instance to retrieve the serviceID of the implementing service.
        Returns:
        integer ServiceID

      • setServerCallback

        void setServerCallback(int serverPort,
                     String extProgramName,
                     IAsyncMessageCallback callback)
        Deprecated. 
        Called by a ITCPSocketServer instance to bind to the ITCPSocketService. Provides an asynchronous callback for sending messages to the client.
        Parameters:
        serverPort - port hosted by the ITCPSocketServer instance
        extProgramName - client identfying name
        callback - callback for sending messages to client

      • unsetServerCallback

        void unsetServerCallback(IAsyncMessageCallback callback)
        Deprecated. 
        Called by a ITCPSocketServer instance to unbind from the ITCPSocketService. It is recommended that the ITCPSocketService instance use some combination of serverPort, extProgramName, and the callback object to track active/inactive client sessions.
        Parameters:
        callback - inactive callback

      • clientCallResponse

        TCPSocketMessage clientCallResponse(int serverPort,
                                  TCPSocketMessage message)
        Deprecated. 
        Called by a ITCPSocketServer instance to deliver a client message. If return is null, no message will be sent to the client in response.
        Parameters:
        serverPort - port hosted by the ITCPSocketServer instance
        message - SocketMessage from a client
        Returns:
        SocketMessage to be delivered to client in response
